name: Throw Me A Bone
description:
Throw Me A Bone

Help the protagonist Skelli to defeat the evil Pumpkin Scarecrow and his minions in an epic little boss fight!

Controlls

Move left/right: A, D
Jump: Spacebar
Shoot: Mouse left*

Info

Throw Me A Bone was made by a team of two game design students in 24 hours for the 2021 Halloween GGS Game Jam. It was hosted by Gotland Game Students of Uppsala University - Campus Gotland.

The theme of the game jam was relatively open, besides having to be Halloween related, so that we could make whatever we saw doable in each individual group.

Credits

Leo Wognum - Programming, Animation

Anna Hatzl - Environment Art, Character Art
